trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that has been applied by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> action.
trans-unit.target: Modifica un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> che è stato applicato mediante un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> azione.

trans-unit.source: ## Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a ControllableStoryboardAction object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ##Pause, Resume, arresto o in caso contrario controllo un Storyboard in modo interattivo per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare in caso contrario un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>impostato in modo interattivo, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>proprietà del relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e utilizzare un oggetto ControllableStoryboardAction (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) per controllarlo facendo riferimento al relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>non è possibile controllare in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> che ha avviato il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> si desidera controllare in modo interattivo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> che ha avviato il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> si desidera controllare in modo interattivo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
